casebody.data:
DAUGHTRIDGE
v.
TANAGER LAND, LLC 325A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 5, 2018 Ronald H. Garber, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Daughtridge, Albert S. (Jr.), et al. Charles S. Rountree, III, Attorney at Law, Tarboro, for Tanager Land, LLC

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 31st of October 2018 by Defendant:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of December 2018."
